ing: 2 tablespoons fresh blueberries, or more to taste
des: "This is my go-to oatmeal. I have a bunch of other recipes saved I keep meaning to try, but this one is so easy when I'm sleepy and don't want to be awake, I just make this instead."
ins: Combine oatmeal and milk together in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until warm and thickened, about 30 seconds. Stir blueberries and maple syrup into oatmeal.
